actions.name: Unifying Spirit
actions.description: Effect: Every Allied creature within range has their SPATK and SPDEF stats increase by 20%.

actions.name: Unifying Spirit
actions.description: Passive: the user's SPATK and SPDEF are increased by 10% if there's at least one ally within range. This increases to 25% if there are 5 or more allies in range, and 50% if there are 10 or more.
